Package reachabilityGraphLayout

Class LayoutNode

java.lang.Object
reachabilityGraphLayout.AbstractLayoutRectangle
reachabilityGraphLayout.LayoutNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<AbstractLayoutRectangle>, LayoutPointInterface
public class LayoutNode extends AbstractLayoutRectangle

Class representing a node in the Layout.

Because nodes are implemented as rectangles in the layout the LayoutNode extends the abstract rectangle class. It therefore also implements the LayoutPointInterface where the point is represented by the center of the rectangle (and therefore by the (x,y) coordinates of the nodes in the GraphStream graph).

    • getTag

      public String getTag()
      Get a tag for the node. The tag consists of the parent tag (if the parent != null) plus the own index. Nodes in each level can then be sorted by their parent and own index so that nodes are closer to their parent creating less intersections between edges.
      Returns:
      the tag for the node

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Gets the level.
      Returns:
